data.title: Jazz Jams
data.description: Experience the best jazz our city has to offer with local jazz duos and bands, some up-and-coming and some renowned.

children.text: Jazz Jams are for all our die-hard jazz fans wanting to experience the best jazz our city has to offer! We have local jazz duos and bands, some up-and-coming and some renowned, playing once a month. Check out our event page on Facebook to see our drinks and deals available that day.

data.bookingInfo: Booking information to be advised closer to the date.
data.quote: The best jazz our city has to offer

data.title: Rockerfella
data.description: Rockerfella are back touring the country, kicking it all off in the Garden City.

children.text: After 16 years since their last recording, Rockerfella have returned to the recording studio with a bang! Releasing their first single which entered the chart at #60 the first time ever an unheard of song has ever been voted into the chart let alone enter so high! Followed up with the much anticipated Volume 1 release in the four part series in March Rockerfella are hitting the road in support of the release of Volume 1 in the 4 part volumes series this September and October.

data.bookingInfo: Booking information to be advised closer to the date.
data.quote: Rockerfella have returned to the recording studio with a bang
